meanings.sent1: The building had a cuboidal design with equal sides.
meanings.sent2: The dice is a cuboidal object used in games.
meanings.sent3: The cuboidal gift box was easy to wrap.
meanings.sent4: Her cuboidal jewelry box held precious treasures.
meanings.sent5: The cuboidal ice cube tray made perfectly shaped ice cubes.

meanings.definition: Having the shape of a cube.
meanings.sent1: The toy had a cuboidal appearance with sharp edges.
meanings.sent2: The sugar cubes were cuboidal in nature.
meanings.sent3: The cuboidal cake looked too perfect to eat.
meanings.sent4: His cuboidal head seemed to be carved out of stone.
meanings.sent5: The cuboidal room felt cozy and compact.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to a cube.
meanings.sent1: The cuboidal measurements were precise and accurate.
meanings.sent2: The cuboidal root structure provided stability to the plant.
meanings.sent3: The cuboidal pattern on the fabric was eye-catching.
meanings.sent4: His cuboidal thinking led to innovative solutions.
meanings.sent5: The cuboidal nature of the box made it easy to stack.
